activities: HealthyWage receives and processes personal data relating to corporate clients, employees of corporate clients, and users of HealthyWage's wellness challenge online platform within the EU/EEA and Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data includes contact information (name, email address, street address), limited wellness information (weight, height, date of birth) and payment card information.  The data covered does not include manually processed data.
recoursemech: For consumer and client data, HealthyWage will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules (JAMS Safe Harbor Program).
